1) Alt F-12 to turn on the debug menu. 

2) Pick the option that says "Whack-A-Kerbal". 

3) Select your size/shape/mass options carefully.

4) Pick a target.

5) Aim carefully and use the middle mouse button to shoot.

6) ???

7) **PROFIT.**
It doesn't work while you're in orbit.

> 
> It doesn't work while you're in orbit.

Not true, however you have to take orbital velocity into account when you use it in orbit, so it helps to set your size really really tiny, your mas really really big, and zoom way into where you want to shoot.
Thanks! Now i can go kerbal bowli- I men, doing science with spheres!
Ok, I really didn’t know what it was, now I do, and it looks like a very kerbal thing to do.
